description:
• Shows where a mod is from in inventory tooltip by just hovering it.
  • Shows a nice hud tooltip to tell you what block you are looking at.
  • Some more data can be added to the tooltips using a stable API. Around 15 major mods already supported, many more to come.
  • The hud tooltip will also show you liquids and entities.
  • The hud is completly configurable (position, transparency, scaling, lines to show).
  • Tagging of all keybinds with the mod adding them (no more figuring out what key does what).
  • Direct call to NEI when you are looking at a block ingame (Keybind 3 and 4). It will display the recipes/usages directly without having to use the inventory.
  • Callable list of enchants from NEI (press I while hovering an item). The list will show what mod adds an enchant so you can look it up on the internet.
name: Waila
